articles.title: Astronomers Found a Crater From The Mystery Rocket That Smashed Into The Moon - ScienceAlert
articles.description: The Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter (LRO) – NASA's eye-in-the-sky in orbit around the Moon – has found the crash site of the mystery rocket booster that slammed into the far side of the Moon back on 4 March 2022.

articles.title: A 125 Million-Year-Old Dinosaur Fossil Has the Oldest Belly Button Known to Science - IGN - IGN
articles.description: Paleontologists have discovered the oldest belly button known to science on a 125 million-year-old fossil of a dinosaur in the genus Psittacosaurus. Oh, the fossil also had the first dinosaur butthole ever found.
